name: Classic
description: Traditional format with formal typography and professional layout

sections.title: Professional Summary
sections.content: Dedicated financial analyst with 7+ years of experience in investment banking and portfolio management. Demonstrated expertise in financial modeling, risk assessment, and strategic planning. Proven ability to analyze complex financial data and provide actionable insights to senior management.

jobs.title: Senior Financial Analyst
bullets: Conducted comprehensive financial analysis for $500M+ investment portfolios
Developed complex financial models for mergers and acquisitions
Presented investment recommendations to senior management and clients
Led team of 3 junior analysts in financial research and reporting

jobs.title: Investment Analyst
bullets: Performed due diligence on potential investment opportunities
Created detailed financial reports and presentations for stakeholders
Monitored portfolio performance and recommended rebalancing strategies
Collaborated with research team to identify market trends and opportunities
